title: Talking Tom Cat 2 FULL v2.0.4 Final By bobiras2009
description:
By bobiras2009	
		

If you appreciate my work you can leave a commnent and seed this for as long you can to help me upload more.


Requirements: Android 2.1+
Overview: Tom is back with an all new adventure! Tom is your cat that responds to your touch and repeats everything you say in a funny voice.


Since Tom is now an international celebrity, he's moved out of the alley and into a cool apartment.
But everything is not perfect for Tom, his neighbour Ben teases and pesters him constantly.

Ã¢Å“â€ Slap Tom's face left and right.

Ã¢Å“â€ No ads
Ã¢Å“â€ Press the phone button to make Tom play with the original Talking Tom app and repeat after himself in a funny loop.

What's in this version:
2.0.4: Various bug fixes.
